on reading compounds: 揶揄【ヤユ】banter, raillery, ridicule, teasing, making fun of
揶揄嘲笑【ヤユチョウショウ】ridicule and sneering, (casting) ridicule and scorn (upon)
kun reading compounds: 揶揄う【からかう】to ridicule, to tease, to mock, to chaff, to razz, to banter with, to make fun of, to poke fun at, to make cracks about
